Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique features and high quality that set it apart. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
